snippet.title: Hytale Is BACK And Early Access Might Be SOON!
snippet.description:
Hytale is officially back, and in today’s video we’re breaking down everything you need to know about its massive revival. Simon has repurchased Hytale, rehired key developers, restored the Legacy Engine, and confirmed an early access release date is coming soon. We cover new gameplay details, modding features, platform updates, development changes, and what this means for the future of Hytale.

*Legacy Gaming Merch Now Available*
https://legacygaming.gg/shop
